scripts.reset: npx sequelize db:drop && npx sequelize db:create && npx sequelize db:migrate && npx sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.test: npx sequelize db:drop --env test && npx sequelize db:create --env test && npx sequelize db:migrate --env test && jest --runInBand --forceExit
scripts.testAll: npx sequelize db:drop --env test && npx sequelize db:create --env test && npx sequelize db:migrate --env test && jest --runInBand --collect-coverage --forceExit
